definition: verdant/lush green and full of life

sentences.english: Blackboards surrender to the Black Forest.
sentences.chinese: 黑板不見了，取而代之的是蔥鬱的黑森林。

sentences.english: There is much greenery in lands of fog and clouds and shadow.
sentences.chinese: 多雲多霧和多蔭的地帶，草木也蔥鬱茂盛。

sentences.english: To seek end-result of mud, in the broomy boscage.
sentences.chinese: 在蔥鬱的叢林，找到泥土的歸宿。

sentences.english: The stranger stood by the window, his eyes fixed on the heavily-wooded hills in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 那陌生人站在窗前，眼睛凝視着遠處樹木蔥鬱的羣山。

sentences.english: The meadows become fresh and green, the trees are adorned with verdure and fruits appear upon them.
sentences.chinese: 草地鮮嫩翠綠，樹木茂盛蔥鬱，果實孕育而出。

sentences.english: All wood lush gardens, towering old pines.
sentences.chinese: 全園林木蔥鬱，古松參天。

sentences.english: Brick entry walkway accented by lush landscaping.
sentences.chinese: 磚入境通道重音在蔥鬱的園林綠化。

sentences.english: The plants and trees glowed with green, vibrant life.
sentences.chinese: 各種植物樹木翠綠蔥鬱，充滿活力。

sentences.english: Up to the present, the ancient tea plants are still luxuriance.
sentences.chinese: 至今，古茶樹林依然蔥鬱茂密，生機昂然。

sentences.english: The trail wends its way through leafy woodland and sunny meadows.
sentences.chinese: 這條小徑穿過蔥鬱的林區和灑滿陽光的草地。

sentences.english: Only the not afraid of cold pine trees still so lush.
sentences.chinese: 只有那不怕冷的松樹依然那麼蔥鬱。
